S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-728 Unable to create databases whose name containg Chinese characters through the client driver
Incremental patches DERBY-728_p2.diff, DERBY-728_p2-test.diff Add server side UTf8CcsidManager and unit test. Change names of "convertXXXUCS2" methods to "convertXXXJavaString" for clarification. UNICODEMGR level negotiation to use the the code has not yet been added.
